Entry.Name: TEXT_LANGUAGE_RUSSIAN_TRANSLATION
Entry.zSingularExpression: (x mod 10 == 1 and x mod 100 != 11) or (x mod 10 == -1 and x mod 100 != -11)
Entry.zPluralExpression: (x mod 10 >= 2 and x mod 10 <= 4 and x mod 100 !=12 and x mod 100 !=13 and x mod 100 != 14) or (x mod 10 <= -2 and x mod 10 >= -4 and x mod 100 !=-12 and x mod 100 !=-13 and x mod 100 != -14)
